title: Is there really such a thing as fate or destiny? If so, how do I know? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is there really such a thing as fate or destiny? If so, how do I know? Oh, this is an easy one. The concept of fate and destiny come to us from Greek myth. They imply at least a limitation on, if not outright elimination of, the exercise of free will. If you believe you can exercise your will and make your own choices, then you cannot believe in fate or predestination.
